title: 07/13/21 DPS Hour 3 Joe Vardon
itunes:title: 07/13/21 DPS Hour 3 Joe Vardon
description:
Joe Vardon talks to Dan about the USA Basketball team after their second loss. He says that these losses do mean something even though coach Gregg Popovich says these games means nothing.
